sentences.en: an outright attack on his actions
sentences.cn: 对他的行为直截了当的抨击

sentences.en: an outright ban on the sale of tobacco
sentences.cn: 全面禁止销售烟草

sentences.en: an outright refusal
sentences.cn: 断然拒绝

sentences.en: an outright victory
sentences.cn: 彻底的胜利

sentences.en: I determined that I would ask him outright.
sentences.cn: 我下定决心要直截了当地问他。

sentences.en: I told him to get lost and leave me alone and his tone quickly changed from obsequiousness to outright anger.
sentences.cn: 我叫他滚开，不要来烦我，他的口气一下子就从逢迎谄媚变成了勃然大怒。

sentences.en: I would rather kill the animal outright than leave it to suffer.
sentences.cn: 我宁愿立刻杀死这个动物而不愿让它遭罪.

sentences.en: If she asked me outright, I’d tell her.
sentences.cn: 如果她坦率地问我，那我会告诉她。

sentences.en: If you have a complaint you should tell me outright.
sentences.cn: 如果你有不满意的事,你应该直率地对我说.

sentences.en: Kawaguchi finally resorted to an outright lie.
sentences.cn: 川口最后干脆睁着眼睛说瞎话。

sentences.en: My driver was killed outright.
sentences.cn: 我的司机当场身亡。

sentences.en: Sharon laughed outright.
sentences.cn: 莎伦放声大笑.

sentences.en: She had failed to win an outright victory.
sentences.cn: 她没能大获全胜。

sentences.en: She was the outright winner.
sentences.cn: 她是绝对的优胜者。

sentences.en: The Convention of Peking in 1860 , which ended the hostilities, provided for its outright cession.
sentences.cn: 一八六零年, 战争结束, 订立《北京条约》,九龙半岛正式割让予英国.

sentences.en: The resolution stopped short of an outright declaration of independence.
sentences.cn: 这项决议几乎成为公开的独立宣言。

sentences.en: The response of the audience varied from outright rejection to warm hospitality.
sentences.cn: 观众反应不一，有人完全不能接受，也有人击掌叫好。

sentences.en: Three people were killed outright in the accident.
sentences.cn: 事故中一下死了三个人.

sentences.en: Why are you so mysterious? Why don't you tell me outright?
sentences.cn: 你为什么要搞得如此神秘？何不明明白白告诉我？

sentences.en: You should persuade her to marry you outright.
sentences.cn: 你应该彻底劝服她嫁给你.
